Package com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.security

Contains the platform implementation of security such as authentication, authorization etc...

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SCUIAuthenticationProvider
    SCUIAuthenticationProvider is the implementation class for ISCUIAuthenticationProvider.
    SCUIAuthorizationProvider
    SCUIAuthorizationProvider is the implementation class for the ISCUIAuthorizationProvider.
    SCUIControllerDataValidationRule<SCUIWebValidationContext>  
    SCUICSRFTokenGenerator
    This class is default implementation of ISCUISecureTokenGenerator vvinocha
    SCUICSRFTokenValidator
    This validator validates the request for CSRF Protection Token.
    SCUIDirectAccessValidator
    This validator should be used to restrict direct access to directories/files which contains configuration data.
    SCUIImplDataValidationInitServlet
    Note: Currently this servlet is not being used.
    SCUIImplDVLoggerInitServlet
    This servlet initializes logger and logger factory to be used by data validation module.
    SCUIImplParamValueValidationAdapter
    This adapter finds validation rules for a particular parameter based on following rules - This adapter first looks for all the rules defined in the context of the current request URI.
    SCUIJSONXAPIInputValidationRule
    This validation rule validates request parameter containing value is JSON format which is being used as XAPI input.
    SCUIOIDCAuth  
    SCUIResourcePermission
    SCUIResourcePermission defines the permission for a resource given by a ResourceId during the authorization.
    SCUISessionChangeHandler
    SCUISessionChangeHandler is platform implementation ISCUISessionChangeAware listener that fetches all the needed session and local session attributes in SCUISessionChangeData when the session changes.
    SCUIWizardDataValidationRule<SCUIWebValidationContext>  

Package com.sterlingcommerce.ui.web.platform.security Description

Contains the platform implementation of security such as authentication, authorization etc...
